snippet: On “60 Minutes” Sunday night, Jeff Bezos of Amazon showed a video of a tiny helicopter seizing a package from a warehouse and airlifting it to a house.
abstract: On “60 Minutes” Sunday night, Jeff Bezos of Amazon showed a video of a tiny helicopter seizing a package from a warehouse and airlifting it to a house.

headline.main: Amazon Floats the Notion of Delivery Drones
headline.print_headline: Amazon Unveils The Prospect Of Drone Delivery
